role_description: An Ansible role that installs tflint on nearly any platform
role_description_full_overview: [tflint](https://github.com/terraform-linters/tflint) is a framework that can help in finding possible errors for major cloud providers, warn about deprecated syntax and unused declarations and enforce best practices.
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that installs tflint on nearly any platform.
